entry.title: About Control Panel
entry.description: The Control Panel home page gives you access to all actions that can be performed on your Campaign instances.

entry.title: About storage capacity
entry.description: In this tab, you can view the storage capacity and utilization information for your SFTP servers.Only SFTP servers that you have access to are shown here. Please contact your Administrator to request access to other SFTP servers.

link.title: Learn more about SFTP storage management

entry.title: About IP whitelisting
entry.description: In this tab you can whitelist IP ranges to establish connection to your SFTP servers.Only SFTP servers that you have an access to are shown here. Please contact your Administrator to request access to other SFTP servers.

link.title: Learn more about IP Whitelisting to connect to SFTP servers

entry.title: About Key Management
entry.description: In this tab you can manage your public keys.

link.title: Learn more about public keys management

entry.title: Add New Ip Range
entry.description: Define the IP Range that you want to whitelist,in the CIDR format to connect to your SFTP servers.

link.title: Learn more about IP Range configuration

entry.title: Add New Public Key
entry.description: Define a new public key for an instance.

link.title: Learn more about how to add a new public key

entry.title: About IP Whitelisting
entry.description: Manage IP Whitelisting to access your instances.

link.title: Learn more about IP Whitelisting for instance access

entry.title: About URL permissions
entry.description: Manage the URLs that your Adobe Campaign instances can connect to. You can view, add and delete the URLs that your selected instance can connect to below.

entry.title: About Instance details
entry.description: View the details of your Adobe Campaign instances: types, names, build information and possible upgrade recommendations.

entry.title: Add New Ip Range
entry.description: Define the IP Range that you want to whitelist,in the CIDR format to connect to your instance.

link.title: Learn more about IP Whitelisting for instance access

entry.title: Add new URL
entry.description: Add URLs to allow to connection to your campaign instance.

link.title: Learn more about URL permissions management

entry.title: About subdomains and SSL certificates
entry.description: Monitor your subdomains and SSL certificates and initiate the process for certificate renewal.

link.title: Learn more about subdomains and certificate

entry.title: Certificate details
entry.description: Get details on a certificate and initiate the renewal process.

entry.title: About your instance version
entry.description: Visit the latest release notes for updated build information. Follow the documentation for help performing an upgrade.
